moves.1... e6: when i was playing O-T-B games, the French was one of my favorite openings
moves.3... c5 4. Bb5+: ? not the best move, better is to guard the center by going c3.
moves.4... Bd7 5. Qd3: ? again, not the best move! best is BxB then c3.
moves.7... h5: now, this was so i could go Nh6-f5 and i wont worry about him going g4.
moves.8. Be3 Nh6 9. h3 Nf5: if g4? i go, hxg4! and if hxg4?? i take his rook on h1!!
moves.13. O-O-O b5: going to attack on the queen side.
moves.14. Nxb5: ? i dont know why he did this???
moves.14... axb5 15. Qxb5 Rb8 16. Qd3 c4 17. Q: ???????? a terrible move:) better is Qd2.
